Package: com.android.build.gradle.tasks

[Java] Class ResourceException

          • com.android.build.gradle.tasks.ResourceException

          • Exception used for resource merging errors, thrown when a com.android.ide.common.res2.MergingException is thrown by the resource merging code. We can't just rethrow the {

            linkplain:
            MergingException} because gradle 1.8 seems to want a RuntimeException; without it you get the error message > Could not call IncrementalTask.taskAction() on task ':MyPrj:mergeDebugResources'
